hero.slogan: "You go with the <1>FLO</1>, you get results for sho"
hero.description: FLO Coaching goes beyond workouts. We shape who you become—because lasting results come from lasting change in how you see yourself.

about.description: At FLO Coaching, we believe lasting fitness results come from reshaping your identity. When you change who you are, your habits naturally follow.

identityFirst.title: Identity First
identityFirst.description: We focus on who you're becoming, not just what you're achieving. Real transformation starts from within.

holistic.title: Holistic Approach
holistic.description: Mind, body, and habits aligned. We build sustainable lifestyle changes that stick for life.

proven.title: Proven Methods
proven.description: Science-backed training combined with mindset coaching that delivers consistent, measurable results.

personal.title: Personal Connection
personal.description: Your journey is unique. Get personalized attention and accountability every step of the way.

services.description: Every journey is different. Find the program that matches your goals, schedule, and commitment level.

testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it. Hear from people who transformed their lives with FLO Coaching.

reviews.name: Yves D.
reviews.content: FLO didn't just help me lose weight—it changed how I see myself. The identity work was the game-changer I didn't know I needed.

reviews.name: Max T.
reviews.content: For the first time in my life, I feel like an athlete. FLO's approach made fitness feel like who I am, not just what I do.

reviews.name: Jelle W.
reviews.content: The personal attention and mindset coaching set FLO apart. I've tried many programs, but this is the first time results actually stuck.

contact.description: Take the first step toward becoming who you're meant to be. Reach out for a free consultation and discover how FLO Coaching can transform your life.

form.title: Send a Message
form.name: Your Name
form.success: Thanks for reaching out! We'll be in touch soon.

footer.tagline: Transform your identity. Transform your life.
